Now I understand the issue! The game calls simulatePhysicsStepWithState once per player move, and the physics simulation only moves each boulder one step down per call. This means a boulder will only move one cell per player move, which doesn't match the requirement.

According to Requirement 1.4: "WHEN a boulder is moving THEN it SHALL continue moving downward until it collides with another object", the boulder should fall all the way down in a single physics simulation, not just one step.
